concept.description: Chocolate bars arranged in depth layers with bokeh - cinematic hero

prompt.main: Professional luxury product photography hero composition featuring MULTIPLE different chocolate bar varieties arranged in layered depth composition across wide horizontal frame, with bars positioned at foreground, midground and background creating cinematic sense of dimensional depth. Foreground bar large and slightly blurred, middle bars in sharp focus as heroes, background bars smaller and softly blurred. Various chocolate types (dark, milk, ruby, white) distributed across depth layers. Small chocolate pieces scattered at different depth planes enhancing 3D effect. Shallow depth of field deliberately used for cinematic bokeh effect. Soft diffused lighting with depth-appropriate falloff. soft off-white background (adjusted to complement the diverse chocolate tones), subtle texture at 3% opacity adding organic character. Cinematic premium confectionery brand hero shot, wide banner format, commercial product photography style, high-key lighting, 8k photorealistic quality
prompt.negative: flat composition, everything in focus, single depth plane, single chocolate type, cluttered composition, dark shadows, dramatic lighting, gradient background, pure white sterile background, packaging visible, human hands, low resolution, blurry throughout, 3d render, cartoon style, plastic appearance, generic AI aesthetic, watermark
